about_the_game:
The official Soundtrack for Rogue State by Little Red Dog Games.

01 - Bring Us The King! (The National Anthem of Basenji)
02 - Basenji Folk Song
03 - The Glorious Leader's Blues
04 - Events Are Rarely Good News
05 - Qarifii Dance
06 - The Star-Spangled Banner
07 - Ready to Execute Your Orders
08 - This Is Too Important
09 - The Revolution Is Never Really Over

All tracks written and produced by Denis Comtesse, with the following exceptions:
- Track 01 lyrics written by Ryan Hewer and performed by The People's Republic of Basenji National Choir
- Track 06 composed by John Stafford Smith
detailed_description:
The official Soundtrack for Rogue State by Little Red Dog Games.

01 - Bring Us The King! (The National Anthem of Basenji)
02 - Basenji Folk Song
03 - The Glorious Leader's Blues
04 - Events Are Rarely Good News
05 - Qarifii Dance
06 - The Star-Spangled Banner
07 - Ready to Execute Your Orders
08 - This Is Too Important
09 - The Revolution Is Never Really Over

All tracks written and produced by Denis Comtesse, with the following exceptions:
- Track 01 lyrics written by Ryan Hewer and performed by The People's Republic of Basenji National Choir
- Track 06 composed by John Stafford Smith

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 32-bit SVGA Video card
  • Sound Card: Supports all DirectX-compatible sound cards
